## Equation morph: Hamiltonian → Driven → Master equation

::: {.slide data-auto-animate="true"}
### Model
<div data-id="eq">
$$
\hat H_0 = \frac{\hbar\omega_0}{2}\,\hat\sigma_z
$$
</div>

<div data-id="note" class="fragment">
Bare qubit as working medium.
</div>
:::

::: {.slide data-auto-animate="true"}
### Model (driven)
<div data-id="eq">
$$
\hat H(t) = \frac{\hbar\omega_0}{2}\hat\sigma_z + \hbar\Omega\cos(\nu t)\,\hat\sigma_x
$$
</div>

<div data-id="note" class="fragment">
Drive couples energy levels to control **work strokes**.
</div>
:::

::: {.slide data-auto-animate="true"}
### Open system
<div data-id="eq">
$$
\dot\rho = -\frac{i}{\hbar}[\hat H(t),\rho] \;+\; \sum_{\ell\in\{h,c\}}\gamma_\ell\,\mathcal{D}[\hat L_\ell]\rho
$$
</div>

<div data-id="note" class="fragment">
Hot/cold baths mediate **heat strokes** via dissipators.
</div>
:::
